•  Our knowledge base O uses the imported terms 
safely if for all classes A, B built from the imported 
terms: 
If   
 Ɛ’ ╞ A ⊆ B, 
then 
 O U Ɛ’ ╞ A ⊆ B 
•  Safety = preserving non-entailments 
•  Safety is also provided by locality (= sufficient 
condition).
